content.detailedDescription: I was out driving around the country listening to music, just killing time before bed. i was starting to head back home into the city, heading south on flaugh rd off of leesburg rd, when i noticed 2 strange lights hovering above a corn field. i pulled to the side of the road as the object turned to its left and began to head west. as it turned, another light appeared as i was now to the rear of the object. the 3 lights formed a triangle and although it was too dark to make out a surface, i believe that it was one solid object since the 3rd light had been hidden before it made the turn. i turned down arcola road and tried to keep up with the object but the tall tree line between fields was only allowing me glimpses. it was speeding up and was soon several miles ahead of me but it appeared to be moving to a higher altitude as well. it then turned south and went another mile or so before heading back east and that's when i finally lost it in the trees between yellow river road and bass road. i drove down bass to try and find it but it was gone.
content.summary: Out for a drive, i noticed 3 light moving slowly over a field.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving east on ridge road, from munster, indiana into highland, indiana at approx. 9 p.M. on 8.1, i saw a bright white low in the sky seemingly over the street, which is a busy road and had many cars on it. at first i thought it was a plane light, but as i continued east the object didn't move. and then as i approached it at the intersection of indianapolis boulevard (us 41) and ridge road, i saw it hovering slightly off to the northeast, near, over over, the ultra grocery store.

it appeared as a diamond, or maybe square shape. i was at the elevation i would expect a helicopter to be, maybe 500 to 750 feet i think, if it was tracking a car of person trying to flee. by now i could distinctly see 2 white lights, a red one, and a green one, of equal site, evenly distributed around the object. i heard no noise, so i ruled out helicopter, although by the distribution of the lights the object seemed about the size of what a helicopter might be.

i could only think that it was a drone. but it seemed rather stationary, in a stationary position, not moving at all. i was waiting for the object to move the whole time i approached it, but it never did as i drove past. it might have looked a little gray underneath, like the shape of the craft inside the shape. the lights we're bright enough to truly reveal the object.

us 41 and ridge is a heavily traveled intersection, and there was considerable traffic at this time. that kept me from pulling over and turning around and taking a photo or video -- i'm sorry. but there had to be plenty of witnesses (motorists) at this time who could confirm. i saw this for few minutes as i traveled past it and nearly underneath. 

i hoped the car window and went slowly to try and hear something and see it more clearly. if there is no drone report, then it was an object unknown to me. i am a newspaper reporter (locally, the post-tribune). i have a reputation and long history of accurate reporting. you can believe my report. i just can't explain what it was.
content.summary: Silent object, not a plan or helicopter, hovers overhead

content.detailedDescription: Walked out my back door to get into my car, when i noticed an airplane very low. i looked north and noticed five objects—i don't want to say hovering, but flying straight; not maneuvering but also moving away from each other. they were going at a slow pace underneath the clouds. planes were flying around them and across from them. there were a lot of planes in the sky at that time—it seemed abnormal to me. other than that, they were going real slow, but they didn't look like airplanes. i first noticed the object because of how bright they were and how close they were at the beginning. it looked like several stars (a constellation in the sky but it wasn't that high) when i first noticed it. i felt like i always feel, when i felt a feeling like "look here" instead of looking the direction i normally look because whatever there was there. like a feeling of "look before it"s too late." it's weird, i don't know. followed them for about five minutes before it looked like they disappeared from view based on the cloud cover.
content.summary: Star-like objects moving north to west across sky under clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
Around 11:30pm eastern time, my boyfriend and i were outside and he asked "do you see that?" in the west night sky,  there were two starlike orange objects moving in figure 8's like a chasing game, they seemed very far away due to the same brightness as some of the brighter stars in the night sky,  then after about 10-15 seconds they move away from each other, and were stationary for about 30 minutes. then slowly faded out. 
there was no noise,  no clouds,  and were not of anything i've witnessed while star gazing before. i've seen comets,  the iss, planes and helicopters,  in the night sky.  this wasn't anything of that sort.
content.summary: Two distant orange starlike objects in sky moving in figure 8, then separate, stay stationary,  then slowly fade out

content.detailedDescription: Noticed 3 neighbors pointing at an object high in the sky.  stopped to ask what they were looking at and they pointed it out. looked like white dot in the sky and they said it hadn't moved for about 45 minutes.  got my 10x binoculars out and looked at it and it looked like a silver metal frying pan upside down with out the handle (disk shaped). when my neighbor looked at it with my binoculars he said he could see a bulge on top.  i drove two miles to work and showed the guys at work.  about 10 of us saw it and continually watched it for about 4 hours it didn't move.  stayed in same spot.  about 3 hours in it got really shinny and reflective on the east side where the sun was.  at about 10:15 a.M. i watched it and took my eyes off it for about 30 seconds while i was getting gas and it was gone. my friend called me and told me at about the same time that it was gone.  not quite sure how to download the picture from my camera to you site?
content.summary: Silver, metalic disk, looked like upside down frying pan without handle. stayed in same spot for 4 hrs.

content.detailedDescription: So i went outside  too  take  pictures  of the blood moon and  i think  if i was  from  another  planet  would like to see  a red moon   so i took set of red moon 16 pictures  and one put. light  we are not alone on the  moon. or space and still continues  to  this day 2016 stop plying pokee mon and look up  instead  of down  to  the ground people  look  up.They are order

content.detailedDescription:
Olallie lake - oregon , july 29, 2016 . approx 11:30 pm . crystal clear skies. 

i went camping with a friend of 20 years to olallie lake near mt. jefferson , in oregon.
i brought two reclining lawn chairs for stargazing with the milky way front and center.
our site had an enormous open sky view. we were enjoying our second night of viewing.
we were pointing out meteors as they became visible, as well as the satellites above.
our site was lakeside ( campsite # 26 ) in the peninsula campground. we were fully reclined in our chairs with a wide field of view with our peripheral vision . 
my buddy at one point said , " there's another satellite .... oh, and one next to it".
 this comment is what made me turn my head to see what he was talking about. my first observation began as the two lights , which were not only larger that the tiny dots that satellites are seen as , but also greater in diameter that the stars by approx. three times. once i started watching these two lights emerge from behind a tall tree to my right ( on the lake side ) i witnessed them moving very slowly and absolutely silent. they continued slowly heading south for about 30 seconds and then ... together as if on either end of a common structure , it started to turn without any change in speed ( an extremely tight radius ), and the lights kept an identical distance away from each other as it did a complete u-turn and just as slowly as it approached, disappeared behind the trees . 
as we digested and discussed what we had both just seen with our own eyes , we turned our gaze back toward the milky way . within 10 minutes i heard my buddy say , 
" there it is again ". i followed his pointed finger and saw it coming from the south this time. and i cannot emphasize enough the total grandeur of witnessing the second sighting as it appeared directly in front of the milky way as if it had just crossed eons of time to present itself. it moved as the first sighting , slowly and completely silent. from my line of sight the two separate lights  seemed spaced at a good distance apart from each other. gauging its altitude was impossible . it did seem to be flying low to the ground. if i were to guesstimate its altitude at 1000 ft. i'd say the distance between the lights were at least a football field's distance apart, if not greater. so, because of its slow movement , my buddy and myself were really able to scrutinize what was virtually flying (gliding) directly overhead . if things weren't interesting enough , this is what i witnessed next, and being only three nights ago i want to write this down while it is still vivid in my memory... as it flew (glided) basically right over the top of us , i was focused on the light on the right side as i saw it. i saw a fine outline around the light as though it was a wing tip with the light positioned just inside the end , centered between the parallel sides and the end. without thinking i said out loud to my buddy ...
" it's cloaked ". 10 seconds later it disappeared behind the same tree , following the exact same path as did the first after it's u-turn. and that is how i remember the events of just a three nights ago. my feelings at the time were of complete awe !!
i  will mention that i am a fine woodworker and artist. my life is all about being detail oriented and i have a very good eye. my projects require 1/32" accuracy. i have also been supremely fascinated by high technology and feel i am quite aware of all things known to the public regarding military capabilities. i am 46 years old and have never seen anything even close to what myself and my buddy witnessed together last friday night. my buddy is probably the biggest sceptic on earth and he is reeling from what he saw with his own eyes. i am convinced that i have been given my once in a lifetime glimpse of true reality. it kind of feels like christmas as a kid. 

p.S. i have a very interesting series of google earth images over a desolate area of peru i'd love feedback on.
content.summary: Two separate encounters within 10 minutes . apparently two separate but identical vehicles with two lights each as if on either ends of a very long wing. low flying, very slow and absolutely silent.

content.detailedDescription: Was outside of my girlfriend  apartment  taking  pictures of the moon  that  night  because  it was the blood  moon  and thought ufos up  there  would like to see the  moon  go redish be like back home so itook them  to my happiness was right here they are we are not alone for sure...
content.summary: Hi i was thing if they were  ufo's why wouldn't they look at the  blood moon  this night and it has not stop  showing up  have  other's  any way itook the pictures as it begins to the end16 pics  one lighting  too  showing that it is  there i'am freak  in

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the process of going to bed,(turning off the television, lights, etc) when the dog came downstairs and appeared to want out.  i checked the clock and saw that it was 11pm.  i took the dog out side and immediately noticed a large bright (red/orange) object in the sky diagonal from where i was standing.  

the object was so bright and large, that my first thoughts were that a small aircraft was on fire and possibly in the process of crashing. i yelled for the dog to come inside fearing it was a crash in process. 

within a few second or so, i noticed that there was no sound and the object seemed to move slow at a steady pace, which was a relief that it wasn't a craft on fire. the night sky was cloudy but rather clear and i could see the bright colours and that there were clouds above the object easily.  

i was confused as to what the object was and wanted to get a picture, but figured that by the time i got my phone, the object would be gone, so i decided to watch the object for as long as i could.  

the object continued the diagonal path over a large housing plan and across the road. as it got closer to my location i saw that there was no tail or after-burn, and that the bright lights were steady and didn't pulse. i also noticed that there was no noise at all.  

the object moved slowly and smoothly as if on glass or a calm body of water.  i saw clouds above the object but had no real idea on its height from the ground.  since there was so much light around the object, i was unsure of it's shape, but thought it was a bit like a fin (more vertical).  i thought of this because as the object moved closer to me(more to my front, but still as high as it was in the sky) i saw it from the side (sort of), and the lights looked taller and skinnier. so i guessed that the object must be tall and flat and not circular and fat. 

as the object passed to my front, i looked for the dog and he was by my side sitting quietly.  the object moved over my house and as i looked to its rear i noticed that it seemed smaller than the front.  the object moved over the trees and then out of view.  

not once was there any noise coming from the object.  i stayed outside for a while and heard nothing.  several planes fly overhead in my area and i've always heard an engine of sorts.  after i went inside, i looked at the clock and saw that about five minutes passed.  

i was very alert at this time and wasn't sure what i saw.  i kept looking out the windows and around 11:30pm i heard a large aircraft.  i looked out my front door and saw that this was indeed an aircraft, and that it was big, made a nice loud noise and flew over my house almost along the same path as the object.

i thought perhaps it was a drone, or maybe some other small aircraft, but than thought that it didn't seem either of these would be out at night or that bright.  i have no idea if this was an object or space junk or even some sort of optical illusion, but i wanted to see if anyone else saw anything like it, and figured that this organization would not immediate dismiss the sighting and may have more information.
content.summary: Large bright/firey object

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
This incident began after a friend and i went outside on the porch to watch a storm system that was approaching at approximately 8:30pm as the sun was setting.  i noticed a look on her face that caught my attention and immediately upon looking south i noticed a very brightly lit "sphere" moving towards us rather quickly from the distant sky to the south.  it was so bright and moving so quickly that it gave the appearance of being close.  the color was a bluish tint but did not appear to be casting light in any direction.  

as the object got closer it abruptly stopped and hoovered perfectly still for multiple minutes.  at this point i began recording with my cell phone... after about :90 the sphere flashed "off" and left just a blinking, or pulsating red light.  at this point my friend took off down the road to try and get a different view and possibly see what size the object was.  when the craft  went to a blinking red light i could see several other red lights further away.  i recorded at couple more minutes of the flashing red before it began moving again.  it did a couple circular patterns before returning to it's fully illuminated state.

at this point it descended below the tree level and began moving from right to left.  i could see it through the trees before it disappeared out of sight.  i kept the camera rolling because i noticed a strange amount of car horns honking and dogs barking after the craft disappeared until my friend came back from down the street.  she reported the same things i saw from the house to include the hoovering, changes of color, and the apparent descent down out of view.  she said that it was much bigger than a drone and had no apparent characteristics of a helicopter.  

i want to mention that the red flashing appeared very distant and dim, but the illuminating glow was shockingly bright making it hard to judge distance.  i had a strange feeling that what we were seeing wasn't meant to be seen and it even made me feel afraid.  heavy breathing and very high heart rate during the 10min ordeal.
content.summary: Brightly lit sphere approaches, hoovers for minutes, flashes to a distantred pulsing strobe, then back to a bright sphere before it goes down behind tree line.

content.detailedDescription: I was taken to their house like bedroom and given information:  "check mr. trumps past you will find clues about his family and in a lexigram of his name you will find proof he was once adolf hitler. look at donald john drumpf.  look for his german grand father and his father see the signs!"  i was then sent back to my room i assumed it was saturday morning, it was thursday morning.  i have a mark, two circles inclosed, like two wedding rings!
content.summary: I was visit and mind interaction.

content.detailedDescription: I didn't encounter a ufo but my phone did snap a photo of something strange in my room.It was in the morning hrs.Of april 29,2016.I was home alone and i had just laid across my bed and sat my cell phone down in front of me.The weight of my body made the cell phone slides towards my body and as it was sliding i saw my phone light up on camera ready.I picked the phone up and it snapped a shot without me mashing the button and as i looked at the phone i sawn an image of something that appeared to look like an alien near my bed next to the window.
content.summary: Observed entity standing near bed.Photo captured.

content.detailedDescription: I was waiting for my plane at queenstown airport and just took a photo of the airfield with my pentax digital camera it was only after i had loaded the memory card to my mac lap to that i  noticed the rather strange formation to the top right of the picture. further closer scrutiny seemed to suggest that there are perhaps two or three other ufos in the sky at the trajectory and time
content.summary: Ufo observed only after digital photo loaded onto mac

content.detailedDescription:
This is my second report filed with mufon, predating my previously reported (and more interesting) sighting by several years.

1. two separate sightings, both occurred overhead of family home during clear summer nights between 2000 and 2004 when i was in high school. during one sighting i was taking the trash out after dark, and during the other sighting i was simply stargazing off the front porch as i spoke to a friend on a wireless phone.

2. perceived movement in the clear sky devoid of any other aircraft / satellite observation.

3. resembled lights of a high-altitude aircraft in size and appearance.

4. in both cases the object was in the shape of an equilateral triangle with a single, constant, bright white light at each corner. in both cases the objects traveled silently from south to north in a straight line at a constant speed. objects were visible for between 30-45 seconds in each case.
during the second sighting i mentioned briefly to my friend that i believed i was seeing a type of stealth aircraft.

5. i was curious as to the nature of the objects given their silent flight and lack of standard blinking navigational lights. but otherwise unaffected.

6. in both cases, objects simply continued on their flight paths until no longer visible over the treeline.
content.summary: Multiple sightings of silent black triangle of three constant white lights, traveling s to n on clear nights.

content.detailedDescription:
Long story short-ive been checking iss feed regularly.This morning i wake up and find this in the upper left corner.I decided to wait it out and see if it was just a reflection on the iss camera lense..The fact that it changed as it entered earths atmosphere makes it clear this is no reflection or man made craft.See for yourselves then if anyone has any compelling info regarding the subject please feel free to email me at bobbyshmotley at gmail.
other than that i use an iphone6 and took screenshots of the entire thing.Ive also uploaded a zoomed photo with hopes that someone can play with the editing functions and make it more visible.
content.summary: I check the iss feed daily and have never seen such a reflection or natural occurrence anything like this.

content.detailedDescription: On the 9th of february of 2016 is when i first observed a very blue like star in the night sky at around midnight and when i asked questions to  it, it would always move toward the right and if it was a answer of no it would blink out and i see these lights every night. a very bright yellow star like light and a blue star like light. i do know why these lights are here and they have never harmed me, just lights in the night sky every night. i see them outside my home nightly and now i wish they would go away. it is now the 1st of august.
content.summary: I see these yellow and blue star like orbs every evening. i can make them move.

content.detailedDescription: We just looked out of bathroom window and seen this the night before in the same place we seen 2 ufo we were absolutely overwhelmed it was lovely but spooky also
content.summary: It was like a mist of female head and face inside the night before we did see 2 ufo possibly

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving my boyfriends house around 2am, driving west. above the trees on the mountains in the distance i saw what appeared to be a fireball. it kinda looked the way a match head does when it's first lit, the ball of fire starting at the bottom and fading at the top. but it was above the tree line. i stopped to watch as i live in fire country and wanted to call for help if needed. then the fire disapated leaving a behind a glowing orb. i couldnt believe what i was seeing. it hovered several seconds, then slowly rose, from my perspective about a foot,  so maybe a couple thousand feet? it hovered again a minute more at most then just shot off to the west. there was no slow start, it just took off like a bullet. i've never seen anything like that before or since. i'd love it if i could see it again. i've never forgotten it. seeing something so unexplainable.
content.summary: Fireball to orb. hovering. slow ascent. hovering. shot off to west

content.detailedDescription:
After arriving at our beach rental.  i happen to look up into the sky literally straight up above me. 
i saw what looked like a fireball moving from west to east. 
as it moved i could faintly hear the wine of jet engines. due to the brightness of the flames i could not confirm its shape. it continued to climb. 
i suspected it could have been an airliner type aircraft. as it continued east the flame went out. the jet noise that follows was very faint. i also suspect that if it was an engine fire the crew managed to cut off the fuel supply and let the fire blow itself out. 
as it continued on it went out. 
i did notice afterword at least two airliners at higher altitudes headed in the general direction of where i last saw the flames go out. 
i expected to see a huge fireball. but since none appeared i suspect the fire or flameout was taken care of. 
what i find curious is that i have seen no mention of a "fireball" in the sky on any media source since then. 
i did make a short video of it
content.summary: May have been a jet/commercial airliner with engine fire.

content.detailedDescription:
This is not my story but in fact my grandmothers. i know it happened when i was young sometime before i was either three or four and when i heard this story it came as somewhat of a shock to me.
it all began a few years ago in 2008 when i was staying with my grandmother for a few months and all of a sudden my grandmother relays a story to me about when i was a very young boy when my mother, father, her and me went to manchester and stayed overnight in a hotel. strangely enough there was two strange incidents in this trip but i’ll focus on the main incident first.
so my mother and father had one room and i and my grandma had another room and my grandma was in the hotel room when she said she saw what looked to be a fiery meteor flying towards us. she said that it struck the steeple of a church opposite the window and then proceeded to fly at the window of the hotel room.
she said it then materialised into a small white man in the room. my grand mother ran over to me and grabbed me and began to pray. being muslims we know prayers from the heart and she began to pray. she then said that the little white man began to run around us in a circle but the whole time she held me in her arms, now remember at the time i was maybe 3 or 4 so quite small.
she then told me that the little white man apparently was warded off by the prayer and then walked away into the bathroom and vanished. she checked and there was no one there and she was convinced that the being was trying to get to me or us and that by praying she stopped the being.
now just to clarify two points, at the time i heard this i was stunned by the sudden admonition and i called my mother who claims never to have heard this story which is strange because my grandmother must have not mentioned it for ever a decade until one day out of the blue she mentions it to me.
now before i wrap this up there was another mysterious event that happened during that same trip that my parents talk about to this day. when we drove back to our home in houslow middlesex which is about 3 or 4 hours from manchester depending on traffic about halfway home they realised they had forgotten their address book in the hotel. but the strange thing is that upon arriving at our home what was on the table in the middle of the living room, the address book. which is strange because they had used that same address book to find a place they had traveled too in manchester to begin with.
i will not speculate as to the how’s and where forth of the address book and how it returned home or whether it ever left the home to begin with. that’s a discussion for another day but i do find both accounts of the same trip odd.
now i asked my grandmother for details of the white being and she seemed reluctant but not afraid of the memory. i will add this my grandmother was brought up in rural india during the age of the british empire and she never learned how to read. her english was understandable but she was not well educated and never went to school, i doubt she ever learned what aliens were and she was highly pragmatical and faithful. i doubt she would ever have thought of aliens from beyond the stars and as such i find unlikely that she would think to make such things up, although in all my decades knowing her she never once lied to me. but remember at the time my grandmother was an elderly lady and has since passed on but the story she relayed to me has stayed in my mind for years and now i am doing my duty by relaying the story to you.
content.summary: Fireball turns into small white being in hotel room

content.detailedDescription: In the sky to the west of our home there was an ufo flying against the direction of the earth first appearing to hover, then moving closer and higher in the sky. the ufo changed direction to the south then circled clockwise several times before stoping and moving at a 35 degree angle upwards and to the north. the object dimmed and disappeared as if it moved away from us out of view for a few seconds then rotated back towards us and became even brighter than before. there was minor cloud cover, but the clouds were not obstructing our view at this point. when it reappeared it appeared to eotate towards us showing a cone shapped light protruding from the top of the object then moving in circles as it rotated backwards away from us. then it began to move to the north and around in circles again before disappearing behind a cloud.
content.summary: Myself and 4 family members saw light moving against horizon, zig-zaging and making circles.

content.detailedDescription:
To be honest i have had many encounters in my life and although technically this is not the first encounter this is always the first that comes to mind when i think of encounters i have had in the past.
i will briefly elaborate on where i was. i was 14 and this was when i was in a boarding school in the midlands of england. i was in my dormitory which normally had three occupants including me, but it was a sunday morning and the two other occupants of the dormitory lives close enough that they could go home every weekend.
as it was i was alone in the room and for no reason what-so-ever i awoke in the morning. i normally never awoke that early and it was early enough that i could look out of the dormitory window and see the early morning glow of the sun-rise outside and i could barely make out the tree-line of the hills outside.
i remember looking up and seeing this huge craft filling the sky overhead. i got the impression of it being triangular in nature but in truth i could barely make out the sides let alone the horizon. i watched it for several minuets as it very slowly drifted overhead.
at no point did the craft make an attempt to shift or suddenly jump away. instead it continued to slowly drift across the sky.
i will describe the underside as best i can. the underside of the craft of either dark grey or black, every now and then i could make out small lights, the majority of which were still but a few blinked. i think most were either white, or some shade of yellow through orange but defiantly there was no shade darker than this.
the underside of the craft was not smooth, no in fact it was filled with ridges and what looked to be tubing or pipes although to be honest it was far enough away that i could not make out details of these tubes or pipes on the underside.
as i watched it i remember getting the impression that i was watching a floating city, although in truth i have no idea how my teenage mind would come to such a conclusion. i spent several minuets watching it until it was gone, i did not see any engines on the craft and when it was gone i remember having a still feeling.
come to think of it back then even until now i have always had this kind of still, almost blank feeling when i remember seeing this thing. i have heard in some cases people feel awe inspired or it changed them and i will be honest this is the first and only experience i have ever had with these things in regards to seeing them with my eyes and yet. in truth i have always had this bland feeling when remembering it. which in itself feels a bit disconcerting because i feel like i should have more awe when thinking about these things. but anyway. this is my account. given to the best of my ability and hopefully someday it may be of service to you or humanity at large.
content.summary: A massive triangular craft that slowly flew over my boarding school

content.detailedDescription:
At the time, me and my youngest son where on the balcony looking at the planets and the constellations. my son mathew spotted a mooving star... up in the skies. i turned over and spotted a bright white orb mooving from west to east. i took my cell phone and started to tape the object after i've noticed that there was no positioning lights on the aircraft. the hole time i was "filming" the orb, i never saw any positioning lights nor heard any noise coming from the observed phenomenon. i'me open to all suggestions and willing to share my mp4 of the phenomenon with you guys.  

daniel duguay captain (ret.) canadian army, chemist, msc chemistry 
581 998 5957 cell
content.summary: White orb moving in a slow west to east path without making any noise. i have a short video for mufon

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
1. at my window watching a non stellar blue jay as i smoked a cigarette. 
2. bird flew past the area it was occupying in the sky. 
3. box kite were the initial reaction but quickly dismissed as it were unmoving yet started to move a moment later. 
4. perfectly still, perfectly vertical, perfectly symmetrical at first blush. as i watched it it seemingly wobbled as the opposing side rotated slightly towards me. as it did that and then back you could see a projection or appendage, same glossy material, same stark sharp lines. appendage protruded at a 30 degree downward angle and appeared to be half the width of the depth of the overall craft. appendage ended in a 30 degree downward sharp angle. as if it were a 2" x 4" piece of lumber angle cut. cut portion had sharp lines just like the rest of the craft and matched the line that makes the bottom of the craft, again symmetrical in shape (followed the same line as the bottom and top of the object). it rotated back to the initial position seen and that was when i went for my cell phone for a photo. seconds later i was at my window camera ready. it had moved in a line away from the initial sighting but not quickly in appearance it had covered some territory. the photo taken is not good and shows what was clearly seen by me to be a square to be not so square, blurred. samsung galaxy 3. took a second pic but you can not distinguish it in that picture as it was being covered by a passing cloud. 20 to 30 minutes later you could still make out a black speck in the same general area in a break in the cloud formation. also, when it were initially turning in front of me, there were some change to it's glossy nature on the side that faced me. as it rotated it appeared to have an elliptical irregularity to the surface that drew some attention from me but, it still somehow appeared flush, flat and black even though the elliptical shape covered fully 1/4th to 1/3rd of that side. more of a line suggesting an oval rather than a protrusion on the surface itself.

5. have seen a lot of things in my life. many things but this one was a new shape and color unlike any ever seen before.
 had recurring dreams of 1 alien creature. humanoid, grey, standing in near total darkness. these persisted for a few days .. up until i spoke with someone about them. they have since stopped after 1 additional dream and all of these dreams have made me wake each time at the same point. a classic grey alien in a near black field. not truly a field just the blackness of a dream with one identifying feature. a grey standing looking my way. likely my psyche reacting to two sightings (earlier report by me on file) very close together.

6. it truly was a speck when i stopped watching it. hard to make out with the unaided eye. also, when i tried to photograph it. my camera kept changing focus from the object to the closer object, a telephone pole and transformer. really thought i had snapped the pic as the focus box was on the craft .. unfortunately my cell ahs never taken very good pics. it appears very small. to the right of the pole and above the highest wire and you will need to enhance/enlarge at least a few times to see. original photo saved on phone. will not delete
content.summary: Stark edges, glossy black, obsidian. rectangle, 1/3rd as deep as it were tall. apendage displayed briefly on slight turn.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on the back deck of my parents bedroom looking at stars when the object came into my view. it was traveling what seemed to be slow and the details of the craft were very visible. it was shaped like 2 bowls stacked together with a partial flat area on the top and bottom in the middle. it was roughly 300 feet above the corn field moving what seemed slowly. it had orange pulsating panels that were outlined in black trim. the object was maybe 200 yards away. there was no sound at all. i knew as soon as i saw the object it was an alien craft.I had a strange feeling i was being watched from something inside the craft. i watched it moving over the corn field for a few minutes. i ran in the house to get my parents. it was gone when we got back on the deck.There was an actual report right after my sighting in the next town. a farmer had a picture of a disc craft he had sighted but it did not look the same as the one i had seen.
content.summary: I watched the craft with orange pulsating panels move slowly over the corn  field making no sound. had another experience but not sure it was real.

content.detailedDescription: Outside taking a walk when my wife spotted the first object. it was followed by five more objects on an identical flight path. looked to be red in the center with orange/yellow extensions above and below. pretty daunting. we have no idea of the size and scale, nor the distance from us. definitely no marking lights or strobes. what was remarkable is how they made the ascent and turn so smoothly and precisely. if they were distant, they were moving quite rapidly.
content.summary: Ascending in an arc from sw towards nw
